job_description: In a cybersecurity-focused data role, I leveraged cloud infrastructure to enhance system reliability and scalability, ensuring high uptime and efficient resource utilization. I utilized Google Cloud to deploy and monitor data workflows, implementing health checks and retries to minimize latency and prevent failures. My responsibilities included managing project tracking through a collaboration platform, which improved team coordination and transparency. I optimized analytical query workloads to reduce memory footprint and improve response times during peak periods, leading to more consistent performance. I used Jira in production work and ongoing maintenance. Additionally, I developed data processing scripts in Swift to streamline operations and ensure reproducibility across environments.

I led the implementation of static application security testing to enhance code security and reduce vulnerabilities, ensuring compliance with industry standards. I oversaw the integration of version control workflows with GitHub to streamline collaboration and improve deployment reliability. By establishing robust identity and access management protocols, I strengthened security controls and minimized unauthorized access risks. Additionally, I optimized deployment pipelines by designing rollback mechanisms and enforcing release tagging conventions, which significantly improved system uptime and deployment throughput. These efforts collectively resulted in a more resilient SaaS platform with reduced error rates and enhanced security posture.
